scripts.deploy:local: graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 notional-finance/local-v2 && graph deploy notional-finance/local-v2 ./subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 --version-label 0.0.1
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn run prepare:goerli && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/goerli-v2
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn run prepare:mainnet && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/mainnet-v2
scripts.deploy:mainnet-debug: yarn run prepare:mainnet && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/mainnet-debug
scripts.deploy:studio:arbitrum-debug: yarn run prepare:arbitrum-one && yarn run codegen && yarn run graph deploy --studio notional-finance-v3-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:studio:arbitrum: yarn run prepare:arbitrum-one && yarn run codegen && yarn run graph deploy --studio notional-v3-arbitrum
scripts.deploy:studio:mainnet: yarn run prepare:mainnet && yarn run codegen && yarn run graph deploy --studio notional-v3-mainnet
scripts.compile:subgraph: yarn run prepare:local && yarn run codegen && yarn run build && yarn run deploy:local
